description: After a nutritionally approved lunch box recipe? Pack this egg salad sandwich with snacks. It's the perfect kids lunch box idea to keep little tummies full.
keywords: Egg salad sandwich,Quick & easy lunch,Egg,Healthier Easier
name: Egg & Salad Sandwich Lunch Box Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 slices Macro ancient grain & sprout bread
2 Macro Organic free range eggs, hard-boiled and finely chopped
0.5 cup Macro Organic Solanato tomatoes, halved (to serve)
1 pkt Macro lentil carrot bites (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Top one slice of bread with egg and salad mix. Top with remaining bread slice. Cut sandwich in half. Serve with blueberries, yoghurt, cucumbers, tomato and lentil carrot bites.
